remarks: The function operation expressed as a mapping.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 31-Jan-2017.)
statement:
ofcfval2.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
ofcfval2.2 $e |- ( ph -> C e. W ) $.
ofcfval2.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. X ) $.
ofcfval2.4 $e |- ( ph -> F = ( x e. A |-> B ) ) $.
ofcfval2 $p |- ( ph -> ( F oFC R C ) = ( x e. A |-> ( B R C ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d C x $.
$d F x $.
$d R x $.
$d ph x $.
